purpose: Provide a comprehensive and curated list of resources related to Generative AI, including tools, models, and references.
principle: Aggregates and categorizes links and references to various Generative AI resources, tools, and models available on the internet.
reusability: Serves as a reference guide for individuals seeking to explore and utilize Generative AI tools and resources; can be used as a starting point for research or project development.
limitations: As a curated list, it does not provide the tools or models directly but rather links to external resources, which may vary in availability and quality.
name: awesome-generative-ai
description: A curated list of Generative AI tools, works, models, and references
highlight: An extensive and well-organized collection of Generative AI resources, making it a go-to repository for researchers and developers interested in AI art and models.
